com.fizzikgames.fizlib.util.pathfinding

Interface Mover


  • public interface Mover
    A mover is any object that will be moving with the help of path-finding. It will have its own information on which moves are valid and how much they cost and will supply this information to pathfinders to help determine optimal paths.
    Version:
    1.00
    Author:
    Maxim Tiourin

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getMoveCost(Node srcNode, Node dstNode)
      Returns the move cost for this mover to the destination node.
      boolean isValidNode(Node srcNode, Node dstNode)
      Returns whether or not the move is valid for this mover.
